description: A React functional component named TodoItem that renders a single todo item with functionalities to toggle completion status, edit, and delete the todo. It uses hooks for managing editing state and local title input, and styles for layout and appearance.

methods.name: TodoItem
methods.description: React functional component for rendering and managing a single todo item, including editing, toggling completion, and deletion.

methods.name: confirmEdit
methods.description: Handles the confirmation of an edit, trimming whitespace and calling the onEdit callback if the title has changed.
